extension.summary: Resolve common live video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi + find links embeded in sites.
PyAMF provides Action Message Format (AMF) support for Python that is compatible with the Adobe Flash Player.
extension.description: The Adobe Integrated Runtime and Adobe Flash Player use AMF to communicate between an application and a remote server. AMF encodes remote procedure calls (RPC) into a compact binary representation that can be transferred over HTTP/HTTPS or the RTMP/RTMPS protocol. Objects and data values are serialized into this binary format, which increases performance, allowing applications to load data up to 10 times faster than with text-based formats such as XML or SOAP. AMF3, the default serialization for ActionScript 3.0, provides various advantages over AMF0, which is used for ActionScript 1.0 and 2.0. AMF3 sends data over the network more efficiently than AMF0. AMF3 supports sending int and uint objects as integers and supports data types that are available only in ActionScript 3.0, such as ByteArray, ArrayCollection, ObjectProxy and IExternalizable.
Packed for KODI from https://github.com/kennethreitz/requests

extension.news: [add] MPEG-DASH support for Kodi 17 w/ inputstream.adaptive add-on or SPMC 16 w/ builtin-in [add] optional History and Watch Later custom playlist to Settings -> Folders, or (My)Playlists context menu to set/remove [add] Maintenance section to Settings [add] 'Subtitle language(s) to download' selection to Settings -> General [add] 'Force SSL Certificate verification' to Settings -> Advanced [upd] API key set switching from Settings -> API (this will log you out) [upd] Dual login only required if My Subscriptions folder is enabled at sign-in [upd] setting content type from episodes, now videos [del] override view options [upd] Norwegian strings [torstehu] [upd] Greek strings [twilight0] [upd] Portuguese strings [Wanilton] [upd] Dutch strings [flemlion] [fix/upd] API tweaking and various other updates

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.

extension.summary: Livestreamer extracts streams from various services
extension.description: Livestreamer is a command-line utility that pipes video streams from various services into a video player, such as VLC. The main purpose of Livestreamer is to allow the user to avoid buggy and CPU heavy flash plugins but still be able to enjoy various streamed content. There is also an API available for developers who want access to the video stream data.

Bismillahirrahmanirrahim
[B][COLOR yellow]“Sampaikanlah dariku walau hanya satu ayat” (HR. Bukhari)[/COLOR][/B]
Alhamdulillah... dengan izin Allah.. ZonIlmu tertubuh secara tidak sengaja di bawah addon utama [B][COLOR yellow]KODIM[/COLOR][/B] sejak 201. Inilah Dakwah Alaf Baru. Dakwah mengikut peredaraan dan keperluan semasa. :)
Diharapkan dengan ada saluran Islamik seperti ini dapat lagi memberi ilmu, manfaat dan kesedaran kepada penonton dan seterusnya menghidupkan dakwah Baginda. TAKBIR !!!
[B][COLOR yellow]"Barangsiapa yang menempuh suatu jalan untuk mencari ilmu (syar'i), Allah akan memudahkan baginya dengan ilmu tersebut, jalan menuju surga." - [HR. Muslim][/COLOR][/B]
ZonIlmu hanyalah sebagai medium perantara dan jalan alternatif dalam menuntut ilmu, bukan jalan yang utama. Kami menggalakkan para penuntut ilmu untuk menghadiri majlis ilmu dimana sahaja anda berada, kerana disitu lebih afdal dan terdapat barakah. Wallahu ta'ala a'lam.
Pastikan anda share addon ini!!! :)
@Semua Hak cipta adalah milik Allah

Play videos of different ad-financed sports streaming sites.
SportsDevil does not provide any streams of its own; stream quality, content and copyright are responsibility of the ad-financed source web site.
For updates check the readme.

extension.summary: Module providing access to youtube-dl video stream extraction
extension.description: Module providing access to youtube-dl video stream extraction for hundreds of sites. Version is based on youtube-dl date version: YY.MDD.V where V is the addon specific sub-version. Also provides downloading with the option for background downloading with a queue and queue manager.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
